Text.val: 29.05.2012 JH SCR17269 Added update of new fields FCMH_ADMNO, FCMH_CLNTNO and FCMH_DEBH_NO
22.12.2011 SH SCR16974 Added new CLNA fields
09.05.2011 JOH SCR16410 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
28.06.2010 GB SCR15619 Changed value of update the CLNA_SETTLEMENTOFCOSTS

SQL_STMT_U.val: select FM13_BTPC_ADMNO, FM13_BTPC_CLNTNO from :1/FM13 where FM13_BLOCKADVANCE = 'N' and FM13_CLNA_ID = 0 order by FM13_BTPC_ADMNO, FM13_BTPC_CLNTNO for fetch only
select cast (sum (FM13_TOTAMTPAID) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FM13 where FM13_BTPC_ADMNO = :2 and FM13_BTPC_CLNTNO = :3 and FM13_BLOCKADVANCE = 'N' and FM13_CLNA_ID = 0 for fetch only

select FM13.FM13_BTPC_ADMNO, FM13.FM13_BTPC_CLNTNO, FM13.FM13_CLNA_ID from :1/FM13 FM13, :1/CLNA CLNA where FM13.FM13_CLNA_ID = CLNA.CLNA_ID and CLNA.CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'Y' and FM13.FM13_FM18_NO = 0 and FM13.FM13_CLNA_ID > 0 order by FM13.FM13_BTPC_ADMNO, FM13.FM13_BTPC_CLNTNO, FM13.FM13_CLNA_ID for fetch only
